communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Please provide this statistical data points of all juvenile arrests within these Houston Independent School Districts from these yearly periods of 2010 to Present:
	ALL juveniles (non-custodials) arrests over the ages of 10 years of age.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristopher D. Carter

communications.subject: Washington Public Records Act Request: Tacoma intersection safety recommendations
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- documentation on the protocols used to review the safety of intersections during design or redesign
- guidence used by traffic engineers in Tacoma to guide safe intersection design (for example, documentation mentioning or describing the NHTSA Safe System approach or adaptations of similar approaches to intersection safety as they apply in for Tacoma traffic engineering)
- Any historical documentation of the existence of intersection safety reviews as a practice for intersections under the jurisdiction of the City of Tacoma traffic engineering or other applicable department.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joshua Dukes
